description: This file defines API routes for inference operations in a FastAPI web service, including a POST endpoint for running inference and streaming inference results. It handles text processing, claim detection, search, scoring, and streaming of incremental results.

methods.description: Streams incremental inference results, emitting sentence, evidence, score events, and final completion.
